channel.title: Need help with an easy code
channel.description: Hey all i need is someone to explain how i can make varrock safe [detailed pl0x] im new but iv figured out heaps editing my source and its all good now thats the last thing i gotta do. =D

item.title: Need help with an easy code
item.dc:creator: @awesom awesom
item.description:
@awesom wrote:

OK it has two sets of chords, im guessing they are varrock what do i do to just make that not wildy and if i do that wil it make the other parts not wildy cuz i have a tele emote to go to magebank if i changed the chords that would stil be pk area right?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 02:44:42 AM[/size][hr]public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = true; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

thats what it has as i said im new so i dont really understand it all if you could point out exactly what to do it would be sweet =] [br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 02:46:47 AM[/size][hr]do i only have to chnage the cords or do i have to do anything with that inwildy = true stuff??

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with an easy code

item.title: Need help with an easy code
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

Change the chords of what the server thinks is the wild.
Search for “public void checkwildy()”.
Modify it to make the place you want to be non-wild, non-wild.
I suggest you define the place as a box.

There you go, i hope this helps you.

Read full topic
